data.title: AFRIKA BAMBAATAA

data.meta_site_name: C30 - BOW WOW, RECOGNIZE FLAGSHIP SHOP
data.text:
Due to the renewal of our website, this post will be an archived blog.

Thank you very much to all the customers who visited the ""DJ MURO" POP UP" at "2G" that started the other day.

We are pleased to announce that we will be selling the following items: REVERSIBLE JKT & OVERALL by READYMADE×RECOGNIZE×BOW WOW.

STYLE WARS" x RECOGNIZE TEE (*Sold out for C30)

2G pre-sale - AFRIKA BAMBAATAA × GRAND GALLERY × RECOGNIZE All items sold out (STADIUM JKT, CREW SWEAT, TEE, TOTE BAG)

C30 select DJ MURO vintage items (P-ROOM THE WORLD online sales until 3/29 (Mon) 23:59,2G in-store sales until 4/4 (Sun) 20:00)

The pop-up is full of contents.

The pop-up is still open at 2G until 4/4 (Sun.), so please find some time to come and enjoy this too-precious opportunity.

We are very happy to report that the AFRIKA BAMBAATAA × GRAND GALLERY × RECOGNIZE items that went on sale at 2G are all sold out, which shows how much attention they have been getting.

We are planning to sell the items in our store in mid-April.

For details of the collaboration, please click here.

AFRIKA BAMBAATAA, a DJ representing the early days of hip-hop, the godfather of the word "hip-hop," and the founder of ZULU NATION, has always been a legend. He and GRAND GALLERY, which has a store in Tomigaya, Shibuya-ku, which started as a music label, and DJ MURO's RECOGNIZE have teamed up to create this item.

BAMBAATAA's design for this item was based on his own event flyer designs from the 70s and early 80s. The design is a series of works by a magnificent group of artists. The artists are a superb group of people who will never be seen again as a work of art.

Yasushi Ide, owner of GRAND GALLERY, created a song with AFRIKA BAMBAATAA and released the new 7-inch single and CD single "I'm thinking I'm spacing" on March 26.

Even if you have not been exposed to HIP HOP for a long time, you may have heard of them.

The official collaboration with a legend who is also called the father of HIP HOP is a miracle that does not happen so often.

We will introduce the items another day.

C30

BOW WOW, RECOGNIZE flagship store

select : vtg wear, old cassette tape

3 Jingumae, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0001

Morita Bldg. 1F, 3-27-9 Jingumae, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo

tel 03-6384-5811
